## How to test
### Local
1. `npm install`
2. `npm run dev`
3. Open the local URL shown in terminal and validate with sample text.

### GitHub Pages
1. Open the deployed Pages URL for this branch/commit.
2. Confirm routing/base path works and assets load correctly.
3. Validate with the same sample text used locally.

## Checklist
- [ ] Build passes (`npm run build`)
- [ ] UI tested with sample inputs
- [ ] No console errors in browser devtools

Closes #<issue>
